competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Dominant payroll and HR services provider

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll processor for small and medium businesses

competitors.name: Ultimate Software
competitors.notes: Cloud HCM for mid-market and enterprise

competitors.name: Ceridian
competitors.notes: HR and payroll technology, Dayforce platform

context: In 2015, Paycom had recently gone public (April 2014 IPO) and was growing in the mid-market cloud HCM space. ADP and Paychex dominated payroll services. Ultimate Software was a key cloud HCM competitor before its 2020 merger with Kronos. The HCM market was shifting to cloud-based, single-database solutions. Paycom's employee self-service and single application approach were key differentiators against traditional payroll bureaus.
